name: growl
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.
